item.title: "Correlation does not imply causation". So what does?
item.description: Machine learning applications have been growing in volume and scope rapidly over the last few years. What’s Causal inference, how is it different than plain good ole’ ML and when should you consider using it? In this post I try giving a short and concrete answer by using an example. A typical data science task Imagine we’re tasked by the marketing team to find the effect of raising marketing spend on sales.
